thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 8 of 218
thread.title: Freedom78

author: Freedom78
title: Freedom78
text: I reluctantly had to call Intoxalock to get an IID installed in my car and to my surprise my experience was AMAZING!! I was lucky enough to have Maggie help me and she just added so much sunshine to my horrible day/month. I can't thank her enough!!! If she is any reflection of what the whole company is like then I will highly recommend Intoxalock to anyone who is unfortunate enough to need it.
